When Christ abides in the hearts of the church members, all quarrels, all dissensions, all discourteous words, all selfish actions, will be repudiated. Each member will ask earnestly, "Lord, what will thou have me to do?"--Letter 65, 1900, p. 9. ("Appeal in Behalf of Our Work in Scandinavia," November 20, 1900.)
